short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save from the web right into Organyz project folders - in just two clicks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Capture photos, graphics, video, and rich text from the web right into the folders in your projects.

Seamlessly connects you to Organyz a personal content manager/organizer with a new way to speed up tasks that you do everyday with all the digital media and information you collect, use and share. 

You'll get access to six powerful tools that work together with the Web Clipper, all included in one app:

1. CONTENT COLLECTOR - A super-fast way to grab content of any type from anywhere.
2. ORGANYZ CLOUD- Automatically syncs all your devices and saves everything to your own private cloud that you control. Makes your phone, tablet and desktop act like one. 
3. ORGANIZER - Conveniently organize your activities, hobbies, work, and play into Boards with folders. 
4. ORGANYZ WORKSHOPS- Turns the folders you make right into great-looking Sparks that you share.
5. PiCO FIND - a fast powerful search engine that makes sure you never lose anything again.
6. ORGANYZ SHARING MANAGER- Stay right on top of the things you publish - make live changes, pause the share, make versions, and more.

Organyz. Everyday magic to get life back under control.

Easy, fast, convenient, rewarding - and free until you feel you need more. 

Go ahead - let Organyz put your captures exactly where you need them in any of your folders.
